name: JL Katma Fingerprint App
description: The first half of the fingerprint attendance system, made with C# and WPS for the UI. This app handles all the registration and verification side of the attendance system

name: JL Katma Fingerprint Attendance System
description: The second half of the fingerprint attendance system, made with Django for the backend and React-Vite for the Frontend. this webapp handles the management side of the system wherein you can manage sessions, student info and etc.

name: BERT-Based Gmail Phishing Detector Extension
description: A BERT-Based Phishing Detector Extension that reads an email from GMail and checks if it's phishing or not.

name: POS System
description: A basic POS System made with Avalonia for the UI that also handles sales reports.

name: Dyna Soar
description: An extremely basic game made with Godot where the premise is similar to Chrome's Dinosaur Game where you can attack the obstacles coming for you.
